website_summaries.verdict: A perfect mix of the holidays and your favorite Star Wars characters.
pros: This calendar includes a number of recognizable characters and vehicles such as BB8 and the Millennium Falcon
The Santa hat on BB8 is an appreciated festive touch
Pieces like the snowblower also add to the overall holiday theme
cons: Assembly is more difficult than other LEGO advent calendars

customer_reviews.title: Not happy about this
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't in a box. There were shipping labels on the merchandise itself. The box is a bit beat up as well. Not happy about this!
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: not really happy.
customer_reviews.text: This product came with a big shipping sticker on the actual box. This is a advent calendar for my 7 year old....so you use the box...not really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Fun, even for adults.
customer_reviews.text: My kids bought this for me as as somewhat of a tongue-in-cheek pre-Christmas present. The individual items for each day are easy to put together and shouldn't challenge any level of Lego builder. Be aware that there is an ABUNDANCE of extra parts that come with each one. At least one, sometimes three extra pieces. I suppose you could either enhance the items with the pieces, keep them as spares or try to make something else with all of the parts. Definitely recommended for all but the youngest(or oldest) members of the family. The individual parts are tiny and colorful enough to be a hazard for the infant/toddler set and tough to handle/see for the physically-challenged.
customer_reviews.author: HarryLJ

customer_reviews.title: My four year old loved this.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my four year old son. He loved building these with his 17 year old brother every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Six

customer_reviews.title: Don’t forget to use it
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great with this one I guess, we forgot to use it so I will have to do another review next year!
customer_reviews.author: Jenniepayne

customer_reviews.title: Not as exciting as you hope
customer_reviews.text: It was ok. The LEGO city one is better. A lot of small things the kids weren’t sure what they were supposed to be. We have tons of Star Wars LEGO so I was surprised at how many of the days were unknown.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always fun
customer_reviews.text: Always fun for my children no matter how old they get, to look forward to a new treat every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Nunnayrbznz

customer_reviews.title: Listed wrong
customer_reviews.text: I put 2018 in search, didn't realize and cost money to return
customer_reviews.author: Vrabel

customer_reviews.title: won't have a teen in the house much longer and love that this keeps him in the spirit every morning
customer_reviews.text: It's a real treat this year, new story characters and some really clever mini ships!! won't have a teen in the house much longer and love that this keeps him in the spirit every morning!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My son has gotten this advent calendar for the last 2 Years!! He loves it!! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Its Star Wars, Its Lego, Its Christmas, Kids loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: All Purpose Rental & Sales

customer_reviews.title: Very cool.
customer_reviews.text: Featured on a desk at my office, it was very popular. Many people would visit every day to see what was new. Very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson has a few allergies so I can’t buy ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has a few allergies so I can’t buy the usual advent calendar. I have been buying these for a few years and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Box was crushed and all taped up, which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Box was crushed and all taped up, which is an issue since it becomes the final scene when all legos have been removed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Homesley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get these every year for my grandsons and they love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was so fun! Kinda a bummer that 1) it was shipped ...
customer_reviews.text: This was so fun! Kinda a bummer that 1) it was shipped without being packaged (concealed) and 2) one of the days we had a duplicate from a previous day. Bummed to have missed the y-wing
customer_reviews.author: Andris L.

customer_reviews.title: had so much fun putting the daily pieces together and playing with this ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson,who is nine,had so much fun putting the daily pieces together and playing with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my grandson and he enjoyed it very much
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson and he enjoyed it very much. First thing every morning he open a new window.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: The box was in terrible shape when it arrived. So bad, in fact, I am reluctant to give it to my grandson who looks forward to this brand of advent calendar every year. BIG disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Grisham Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's so fun opening one window every day in December
customer_reviews.author: Teacher traniner

customer_reviews.title: Mine was good.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived in decent condition. All the little packs appeared to be there and unopened. I will admit to being concerned when ordered and accepted that I was taking a risk. Paid off for me but seems that your mileage may vary a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Star Wars Advent set for a gift and had it sent directly to my son. When the gift arrived he thanked me for the LEGO set and I was happy it got there. When December 1rst. arrived he started putting together his pieces. He sent me a picture of one of them and it was a husky dog with a bowl and turkey leg. I commented back it sure didn’t look like Star Wars! He replied that didn’t send Star Wars. The set he got was LEGO City. It was priced quite a bit lower than the Star Wars one I paid for. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ponygirl

customer_reviews.title: My nephew & neice loved it!
customer_reviews.text: And its a usable toy long after Christmas. Added benefit of not being candy.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne S

product_meta.title: LEGO Star Wars Advent Calendar 75184 Building Kit (309 Piece)
product_meta.description: Get ready for festive fun with the LEGOË Star Wars Advent Calendar. Behind the doors lie a galaxy of Star Wars minifigures, star ships, vehicles and more waiting for you to discover! Once you've collected all the gifts, unfold the playmat and play out your own epic adventures on desert planet Jakku, Star killer Base and in deep space. With this calendar, the holidays will arrive quicker than you can say "Unkar's Thug!".
feature_bullets: Open a door every day to reveal 24 different LEGO Star Wars themed gifts
Features seven minifigures plus a fun holiday-themed figure

Vehicles include The Ghost, The Phantom, Stormtrooper transport, Rey's speeder, Millennium Falcon, Snowspeeder, Kylo Ren's Command Shuttle, Y-wing, TIE Striker, Hovertank, AT-ST, blaster cannon, snow blower and a sled with boosters
Weapons include three blaster pistols and two blasters
Accessory elements include a wrench and a crowbar

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars688 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
